title: Question 6:
description: I used to have some Havven (HAV) tokens. How do I switch them to SNX?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
HAV tokens had a name change to SNX, so you don’t have to convert them. However, your wallet may not have updated the name, because not every cryptocurrency wallet enables all ERC-20 tokens to be viewable by default.
First check the token balance of your address on [etherscan](https://etherscan.io/) to see if you actually have SNX. If they are showing in etherscan but not in your wallet, then you’ll know it’s just that your wallet provider/viewer has not updated yet. If so, look for your wallet provider's help documents to find out how to add custom tokens.

fields.title: ​
fields.value:
The token address for SNX is: [0xC011a73ee8576Fb46F5E1c5751cA3B9Fe0af2a6F](https://etherscan.io/token/0xC011a73ee8576Fb46F5E1c5751cA3B9Fe0af2a6F) 
Decimals: 18
You can find a list of all our token contracts here:  [synthetix.io/tokens] (https://www.synthetix.io/tokens)
You can see everything you need about your SNX if you connect your wallet to Synthetix Mintr  [mintr.synthetix.io](https://mintr.synthetix.io/)
